Smart Pencil Sharpener: Create a pencil sharpener that uses AI technology to adjust the sharpness of the pencil based on the user's preference. This smart pencil sharpener can be controlled through an app on the user's phone, allowing for precise control over the sharpness of the pencil.

Portable Pencil Sharpener: Design a portable pencil sharpener that can be easily carried in a backpack or purse. This compact and lightweight pencil sharpener can be powered by a rechargeable battery, making it perfect for on-the-go use.

Customizable Pencil Sharpener: Create a pencil sharpener that allows users to customize the length of the sharpened pencil. This can be achieved through a simple mechanism that allows the user to adjust the length of the sharpened pencil to their desired length.

Pencil Sharpener with Built-In Eraser: Design a pencil sharpener that includes a built-in eraser. This can be achieved by incorporating a small eraser into the design of the pencil sharpener, allowing users to easily erase any mistakes or unwanted marks.

Smart Pencil Sharpener with Color Changing Technology: Create a pencil sharpener that changes color based on the sharpness of the pencil. This can be achieved through the use of a special coating that changes color as the pencil is sharpened. This unique feature can help users quickly and easily see when their pencil is sharp enough to use.
